docs.text: MicroProfile System Test Framework Foo 1 Goals Easy to get started Work with any JavaEE or MicroProfile runtime Provide true-to-production tests that are easy to write and fast to run How to use in an existing project: Add jitpack.io repository configuration to your pom.xml: <repositories> <repository> <id>jitpack.io</id> <url>https://jitpack.io</url> </repository> </repositories> Then add system-test and junit-jupiter as test-scoped dependencies: <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>com.github.dev-tools-for-enterprise-java</groupId> <artifactId>system-test</artifactId> <version>v0.1-alpha</version> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.junit.jupiter</groupId> <artifactId>junit-jupiter</artifactId> <version>5.4.2</version> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <!-- other dependencies... --> </dependencies>
